Self.Wiki: This map object represents a part within the map.

TypeIndex.Wiki: The index of a part amoungst all parts of the same model ID.

ModelName.Wiki: The model of the map object, corresponding to an entry in the ModelParam.

LayoutPath.Wiki: A path to a .sib file, presumed to be some kind of editor placeholder.

Rotation.Wiki: Rotation of the map object, in degrees.

Scale.Wiki: Scale of the map object, only meaningful for map pieces and objects.

EntityID.Wiki: Identifies the map object in event scripts.

UsePartsDrawParamID.Wiki: If ON, this part will use the specified parts draw parameters.

PartsDrawParamID.Wiki: The parts draw parameters to use if UsePartsDrawParamID is enabled.

IsPointLightShadowSrc.Wiki: Is this map object to be considered a point light shadow source.

IsShadowSrc.Wiki: Is this map object to be considered a shadow source.

IsStaticShadowSrc.Wiki: Is this map object to be considered a static shadow source.

IsCascade3ShadowSrc.Wiki: Is this map object to be considered a 3-cascade shadow source.

IsShadowDest.Wiki: Is this map object to be considered a shadow destination.

IsShadowOnly.Wiki: Is this map object only rendered when calculating the shadow pass.

DrawByReflectCam.Wiki: Is this map object drawn by the reflection camera.

DrawOnlyReflectCam.AltName: Is Only Drawn by Reflection Camera
DrawOnlyReflectCam.Wiki: Is this map object only drawn within the reflection camera.

EntityGroupIDs.Wiki: The entity ID group this map object belongs to.

DisplayGroups.Wiki: Controls when the map object is visible.

DrawGroups.Wiki: Controls when the map object is visible.

CollisionMask.Wiki: Controls when the map object is visible.

Struct58_DispGroups.Wiki: Controls when the map object is visible.

LightId.Wiki: The ID of the value set from LightSet ParamEditor to use.

FogId.Wiki: The ID of the value set from FogParamEditor to use.

TransitionTime.Wiki: Amount of time it takes for GParam to transition (in seconds). -1 = Some default time.

GrassTypeParamIds.Wiki: The ID in GrassTypeParam determining properties of dynamic grass on a map piece.
